title: My Talking Tom 3.9.3.143 APK #Casual #Games
text:
Downloads 
7 M My Talking Tom is a game very similar to the popular POU (also available for download on Uptodown) where the players will have to raise the cat Tom, giving him all the care that a nice cat like him needs. The players will have to feed him by giving him his favorite food; play a lot of different games with him so that he remains active; and of course send him to bed on time so that he can rest. Only this way you can make Tom grow up and turn him from a little kitten into a real cat. In addition to doing all these actions, with My Talking Tom you will also be able to customize your cat. In total, there are more than one thousand different combinations with which you can give a unique touch to your nice kitten. With My Talking Tom you will also be able to do what the Talking Tom Cat application traditionally did. That is to say, you can say any phrase and Tom will repeat it using his strange tone of voice. My Talking Tom is an entertaining game that follows the same line as Pou and it will let the players take care of a virtual pet and try to punctually attend to all its needs.
